dn11:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nāḷandāyaṁ viharati pāvārikambavane.
dn11:1.3_0: Atha kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
dn11:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:1.4_0: “ayaṁ, bhante, nāḷandā iddhā ceva phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā bhagavati abhippasannā.
dn11:1.5_0: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samādisatu, yo uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati;
dn11:1.6_0: evāyaṁ nāḷandā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissatī”ti.
dn11:1.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā kevaṭṭaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:1.8_0: “na kho ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desemi:
dn11:1.9_0: ‘etha tumhe, bhikkhave, gihīnaṁ odātavasanānaṁ uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karothā’”ti.
dn11:2.1_0: Dutiyampi kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:2.4_0: ‘ayaṁ, bhante, nāḷandā iddhā ceva phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā bhagavati abhippasannā.
dn11:2.5_0: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samādisatu, yo uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati;
dn11:2.6_0: evāyaṁ nāḷandā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissatī’”ti.
dn11:2.7_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā kevaṭṭaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:2.8_0: “na kho ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desemi:
dn11:2.9_0: ‘etha tumhe, bhikkhave, gihīnaṁ odātavasanānaṁ uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karothā’”ti.
dn11:3.1_0: Tatiyampi kho kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:3.4_0: ‘ayaṁ, bhante, nāḷandā iddhā ceva phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā bhagavati abhippasannā.
dn11:3.5_0: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samādisatu, yo uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati.
dn11:3.6_0: Evāyaṁ nāḷandā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavati abhippasīdissatī’”ti.
dn11:3.8_0: “Tīṇi kho imāni, kevaṭṭa, pāṭihāriyāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
dn11:4.2_1: bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
dn11:4.2_3: āvibhāvaṁ tirobhāvaṁ tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse;
dn11:4.2_6: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
dn11:4.2_7: imepi candimasūriye evaṁ mahiddhike evaṁ mahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;
dn11:4.3_0: Tamenaṁ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṁ bhikkhuṁ anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhontaṁ—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṁ,
dn11:4.3_3: tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamānaṁ gacchantaṁ seyyathāpi ākāse;
dn11:4.3_6: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamantaṁ seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
dn11:4.3_7: imepi candimasūriye evaṁ mahiddhike evaṁ mahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasantaṁ parimajjantaṁ yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattentaṁ.
dn11:4.4_0: Tamenaṁ so saddho pasanno aññatarassa assaddhassa appasannassa āroceti:
dn11:4.5_0: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, samaṇassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
dn11:4.6_0: Amāhaṁ bhikkhuṁ addasaṁ anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhontaṁ—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṁ,
dn11:5.1_0: Tamenaṁ so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyya:
dn11:5.3_0: Tāya so bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
dn11:5.5_0: api nu so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyyā”ti?
dn11:5.7_1: iddhipāṭihāriye ādīnavaṁ sampassamāno iddhipāṭihāriyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi.
dn11:6.3_0: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
dn11:6.4_0: Tamenaṁ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṁ bhikkhuṁ parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisantaṁ,
dn11:6.5_0: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
dn11:6.6_0: Tamenaṁ so saddho pasanno aññatarassa assaddhassa appasannassa āroceti:
dn11:6.7_0: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, samaṇassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
dn11:6.8_0: Amāhaṁ bhikkhuṁ addasaṁ parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisantaṁ,
dn11:6.9_0: “evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan”’ti.
dn11:7.1_0: Tamenaṁ so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyya:
dn11:7.3_0: tāya so bhikkhu parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cittampi ādisati,
dn11:7.4_0: “evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan”’ti.
dn11:7.6_0: api nu so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ evaṁ vadeyyā”ti?
dn11:7.8_1: ādesanāpāṭihāriye ādīnavaṁ sampassamāno ādesanāpāṭihāriyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi.
dn11:9-66.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, kevaṭṭa, idha tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho …pe…
dn11:9-66.2_0: Evaṁ kho, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti …pe…
dn11:67.1_0: Imāni kho, kevaṭṭa, tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
dn11:67.3_1: imasmiññeva bhikkhusaṅghe aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
dn11:67.4_0: ‘kattha nu kho ime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti,
dn11:68.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, cātumahārājikā devā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ:
dn11:68.7_0: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, cattāro mahārājāno amhehi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
dn11:69.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, cattāro mahārājāno taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ:
dn11:69.6_0: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, tāvatiṁsā nāma devā amhehi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
dn11:70.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, tāvatiṁsā devā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ:
dn11:70.6_0: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, sakko nāma devānamindo amhehi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
dn11:71.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, sakko devānamindo taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
dn11:72.1_0: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, yāmā nāma devā …pe…
dn11:78.1_0: vasavattī nāma devaputto amhehi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
dn11:79.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, vasavattī devaputto taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
dn11:79.6_0: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, brahmakāyikā nāma devā amhehi abhikkantatarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
dn11:80.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, brahmakāyikā devā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ:
dn11:80.7_1: brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī
dn11:80.7_2: pitā bhūtabhabyānaṁ amhehi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
dn11:80.11_0: ‘Mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jānāma, yattha vā brahmā yena vā brahmā yahiṁ vā brahmā;
dn11:81.1_0: Atha kho so, kevaṭṭa, mahābrahmā nacirasseva pāturahosi.
dn11:81.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, kevaṭṭa, so mahābrahmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
dn11:81.5_1: brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānan’ti.
dn11:82.1_0: Dutiyampi kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu taṁ mahābrahmānaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:82.3_0: “tvamasi brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānan”ti.
dn11:82.4_0: Evañca kho ahaṁ taṁ, āvuso, pucchāmi:
dn11:82.6_0: Dutiyampi kho so, kevaṭṭa, mahābrahmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
dn11:82.7_1: brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānan’ti.
dn11:83.1_0: Tatiyampi kho so, kevaṭṭa, bhikkhu taṁ mahābrahmānaṁ etadavoca:
dn11:83.3_0: “tvamasi brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānan”ti.
dn11:83.4_0: Evañca kho ahaṁ taṁ, āvuso, pucchāmi:
dn11:83.6_1: mahābrahmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ apanetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
dn11:83.9_1: na jānāmi yatthime cattāro mahābhūtā aparisesā nirujjhanti,
dn11:83.10_3: yaṁ tvaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ atidhāvitvā bahiddhā pariyeṭṭhiṁ āpajjasi imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya.
dn11:83.11_1: tameva bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā imaṁ pañhaṁ puccha,
dn11:84.1_1: bhikkhu—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
dn11:84.1_3: evameva brahmaloke antarahito mama purato pāturahosi.
dn11:85.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, kevaṭṭa, taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocaṁ—
dn11:85.2_0: bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhu, sāmuddikā vāṇijā tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ gahetvā nāvāya samuddaṁ ajjhogāhanti.
dn11:85.3_0: Te atīradakkhiniyā nāvāya tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ muñcanti.
dn11:85.5_0: Sace so samantā tīraṁ passati, tathāgatakova hoti.
dn11:85.6_0: Sace pana so samantā tīraṁ na passati, tameva nāvaṁ paccāgacchati.
dn11:85.7_1: yato yāva brahmalokā pariyesamāno imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇaṁ nājjhagā,
dn11:85.8_0: Na kho eso, bhikkhu, pañho evaṁ pucchitabbo:
dn11:85.10_0: Evañca kho eso, bhikkhu, pañho pucchitabbo:
dn11:85.29_0: Attamano kevaṭṭo gahapatiputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
